content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette(10:50 p.M.) i was standing in the drive way. i looked up at the sky and noticed a point of light moving thru the sky. i thought"a satelite" or something like that. i laid myself down on the front step to watch it.There was "some" cloud cover moving slowly over head (west to east). i was watching this point of light moving south to north, when i noticed what looked like maybe 10 or 15 points of light, moving together from south to north. i  then realized that it wasn't just 10...It was 30, then 50, then a 100. i realized i was looking at hundreds...Like maybe 3 to 5 hundred points of light. i stood up. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. it was as if the stars were all moving!!!!! i watched the event for maybe 3 minutes or so. then they were gone. out of sight. but wait,...Now there are more of them. only, this group is going east to west. i thought maybe this was some kind of illusion created by the cloud cover moving overhead. so,...I held my cigarette pack up against the sky..To provide a "stationary object" to use as a guideline. yes, they were indeed moving past my cigarette pack...Rather quickly!!! i still didn't believe it. so,...I got a pole out of the garage, and steadied it on the driveway. yes,..They were moving. all of them at the same speed(no particular formation) it took about five to seven minutes for this east to west group to go from horizon to horizon(that's fast). they had the appearance of "stars in the sky".Very high up in the air,...Maybe outside the earths atmosphere...I don't know,... because i don't know how big they actually are. i've seen alot of weird stuff in the night sky,...Never anything like this !!!!! i still feel like it just couldn't be so. but i also know what i saw!!! it's kinda scary !!! i think maybe we should start paying more attention to what's going on in the sky at night. i seem to be "seeing a steadily increasing amount of activity" in our night sky. particularly in the north, and west, and straight up overhead.
content.summary: 3 to 5 hundred points of light(like stars in the sky)in no particular formation. moving together at

content.detailedDescription: My cousin. and i were playing cards with some friends. it was a very overcast night. i go out the front door to call a friend from college and i notice that there are these bright lights rapidly rotating around a center point in the sky that is obscured by clouds. the lights were moving horizontally in and out of the clouds. there were five lights i could see spaced out across most of my vision. after moving around rapidly in a chaotic manner the lights would return to the middle, slowly go back and again. then they would start rotating, sometimes slower, sometimes faster. we watched this thing in the sky for about four hours. the lights stayed in relatively the same place the entire.Time though. when my cousin left to take our friends home,ten minute there ten minutes back, i stayed up waiting for him to return for an hour and a box before falling asleep. he swears he came right back, within twenty minutes.
content.summary: 5 bright rotating lights moving in bizarre pattern & changing.Shapes

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back porch alone, facing east. my husband was nearby and saw the object when it was well past our neighborhood but he could still see it and agree that it was not moving like a plane would. from afar, the lights appeared more erratic.  

i have been watching the skies closely for about 10 days since having seen the glowing orbs from afar. every night i have been outside around 10-11pm and have mostly seen star like objects that move, pulsate in color lights (mostly red to blue to white). they have always been very far away and i have not seen anything so close during my recent sky watches as i have tonight. 

the object came from the nnw and traveled se. it came into my view after it cleared the neighbors tree. it was at the level of a low plane. the light was very bright and at first i took it as an airplane but it was not so. it appeared to have windows (?) where i saw only white light. i did not see any wings attached. i detected no sound as i watched it pass over the downtown crossroads arts district and toward liberty memorial. i was excited to see what i believe is a true ufo, at a safe distance. i have been wondering if maybe if they know i am watching them and for a moment i looked down and refused to look at it. i guess i am frightened by them but also fascinated and so i can't help myself with looking.  

there were 3 tail lights (?)in the rear and the light flashes alternated at a steady pace. there was a low cloud, patchy cloud that it flew into and that was the last time i saw it. my husband watched saw it for about 30 seconds, analyzing it's pattern. anyhow, after we thought it was gone and all was done...We saw a red light flash that reflected into the clouds that the object entered. we both saw 3 streaks of red light on the clouds. weird. my husband said that the object was most definatley gone after that.
content.summary: Downtown kansas city ufo straight line path, low

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11pm on eastern face of reesers summit overlooking cumberland county's susquehanna valley an orange object what i originally thought was a star or planet began moving south in an arched flightpath. the object came to a stop abruptly and sat hovering at what i could easily tell was an extremely high altitude, also knowing this and how far it probably was easily assuming it was quite large in size. it sat still for about 30sec to a min when it suddenly ejected something in an eruption and stream of light that looked like a black mass or possibly a silhouette of an object moving away from the object. within 3 or 4 minutes helicopter and black helicopter and jet activity spiked heavily for about 15 minutes. also during this time i would like to note there were 4 shooting stars that streaked the sky during the time i watched this hovering star like object.(likely by chance, but possibly having something to do with event??)
content.summary: Object seen ejecting a black mass in an intense flame

content.detailedDescription: On 08/02/2011 i was sitting on my back porch looking at the sky. the night was clear, no haze and normal air traffic was abundant. i saw numerous "regular" satellites passing overhead as well. about 2204 hours i noticed a light appear about 45 degrees above the horizon to the south. at first, i thought it was an iridium satellite, as it grew in intensity and size to a brilliant yellowish color. about 1 to 2 seconds later, a second object appeared behind the first, following the exact path of the first. the objects were separated by a space which was approximately the width of my thumb at arms' length. the second object got increasingly brighter, surpassing the brilliance of the first by a small margin. unlike iridium satellites, these two objects remained at peak illumination for maybe 5 to 10 seconds before fading. my impression is that the objects were self-illuminated and not reflecting the sun. both objects seemed to veer slightly to the northwest as they passed overhead. both objects faded out one after the other and could not be seen anymore. i checked the heavens above website and discovered that there were no iridium satellites or other man made objects in the vicinity at the time of my sighting.
content.summary: 2 bright lights passing overhead

content.detailedDescription: While traveling e. bound on us30 through schererville and entering merrillville. i observed at least 4 maybe 5 orange spheres/orbs which seemed to just hover with no sound over the highway, they were under 400 ft. approx. these lights were spread out into a broken triangle and seemed to just appear or catch my eye. i sensed a very sureal feeling and was totally shocked and amazed. my mind was racing with questions. with narrow sholders on the road and heavy traffic i did not stop but slowed down. one light was larger (sphere) and the others seemed more like orbs. it was cloudy and i could not discern if they were connected. about one quarter of a mile i turned off hwy. 30 to enter crown point and looking back to my right i could still see one orange orb, lighting up the clouds.
content.summary: Multiple hovering orange sphere/orbs in a broken triangle shape over hwy. us30.

content.detailedDescription:
This occured when i was in high school, the date given above is just a guess, but was likely between 1997 and 1999. i'm not sure of the month, but it was a warm evening as we were wearing shorts. 
for whatever reason, we were outside looking at the stars when out of the corner of my eye i caught some movement. the lights were very very dim, you could actually see them better if you didn't look directly at them. they were a reddish color. we saw several "sets" of 5 or 7 lights fly over us (don't remember what direction they were coming or going) over the course of 15 or 20 minutes. there was maybe 1-3 minutes between one set of lights and the next. the lights were always in the same formation, same distance apart, at the same angles to each other. the only difference was sometimes there were 5 lights and sometimes 7. 
the lights were flying across the sky. they pretty much went directly over us and continued on in a straight line distance. there was no sound.
the lights did not waver, blink, or change color.
i hadn't thought about this event in years until i saw something on tv about the phoenix lights. what people saw in az was exactly what i saw in ks. except that they were smaller. if i were to stretch out my arm full lenth, the width of the formations we saw would probably be about the length of my hand. and the lights were much dimmer. the average person walking down the street that night would have noticed because the lights were so dim. to see this, somebody would have had to been looking closely at the sky to begin with. the 2 friends that were with me didn't see them at first either.
content.summary: Several sets of very dim lights, flying in formation

content.detailedDescription:
One of my co-workers and i were driving on i-8 south in the ocotillo desert, ca, usa, and we exit on highway 98 towards calexico. i was in the passanger's seat looking towards my co-worker who was driving when she made the comment, "i can't believe it! they built a stadium to the indians next to the freeway". for that i turned and looked at it and didn't think much about it, to me it was just a stadium. then a few minutes later, my co-worker started crying and started driving faster at about 90 miles per hour. i asked what was the matter, why she was crying and made the statement that she was going to kill us driving so fast, for what she responded: "haven't you noticed? the stadium if following us. i turned and looked at it again, and for some strange reason, i said, "there's nothing to be worry about, you shouldn't be afraid, nothing is going to happen". the stadium scorted us for about 20 miles, until we met civilization. 
this event occurred around november or december of 1986, and i had already called my mother, who was expecting me to arrive at 8:30 p.M.(at that time cell phones were not popular), but when i got there, she was very upset because i was late. at that moment i couldn't understand why she was so upset, according to my watch, i had arrived on time. she kept telling me that i should have given her another call to let her know that i was going to be that late, so she wouldn't have to worry.
it wasn't until about 10 years later that i realized we had missed about 2 hours of our time, for what we had no recollection.
my co-worker made me swear that i wouldn't tell a word aobut it because she didn't want to look stupid, and i did keep my word until about 10 years ago when i was watching a show on tv about the subject and learned how people were giving their testimonies about how they had also missed some of their time and how their watches show the time they were supposed to be living in, but in reality it was about 1:30 - 2:00 hours later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It looked like a stadium was following us in the desert for about 20 miles

content.detailedDescription:
On august 4, 2011 approximately 10:37 pm, my family and i were eating and watching television.  out of the corner of my eye, i noticed a strange deep red orb shaped object that immediately caught my eye.  i immediately got everyone's attention then ran to the door to go outside for a better look.  my wife grabbed our sony 8mm camcorder and began filming while we were trying to keep an eye on all the weird orbs.  
the orbs came from the direction many airplanes travel, however, these were neither airplanes nor helicopters and we began questioning what these objects could possibly be.  there was no noise and they flew in a distinct formation and path for their exit.  the orbs were slowly hovering while moving in a directional path.  the orbs were a red that is somewhat hard to this day describe with certainty.  the orbs traveled from the ssw to the north and then flew west and then the red orbs faded out in order they arrived at a certain spot we noticed. 
 one of our children ran to our neighbor���s home right next to us so they could see and witness what we were clearly witnessing.  the neighbors daughters boyfriend answered the door, stepped out to look and immediately ran into the house uttering ���oh my gosh���.  the daughter came out and witness what my family and i were looking at.  she sat there on the porch just watching and making comments of "what is that', what the hell is that" and then mentioned her and her boyfriend seen something strange in that exact direction a few nights earlier.  
my family and i were amazed and questioned what we all clearly seen with no obstructions.  i do not have the time to waste or wish to hear some illiterate excuse officials have given over the years.  i started not to mention this but it has bugged me tremendously.  i do not wish to be known as a confirmed ufo true experience captured on video and witnessed.  i do however wish to inform the public of what was clearly seen; which was not ordinary in any form i could possibly try to compare to these orbs.  i know what was witnessed and captured on video and that is all the proof i need.  an honest investigation is what i am asking.  thank you very much in advance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Weird strange multiple deep red flying orbs.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and standing out in front of my station talking on the phone with my fiance. it was about 11 pm. and, as i often do, i was looking up at the night sky while i paced around. i saw a large, pale blue, circular light off to my left moving very very rapidly. it appeared in my line of sight, seemingly, out of nowhere and disappeared from view in just another 2-3 seconds. my view was obstructed by some trees but it was quite easy to see that it was pale blue and extremely bright. it was so bright, in fact, that i was able to see the glow of the light past the edge of the trees it was moving behind. from my point, looking up from the ground, the object appeared to be near the size of a basketball in the sky. just a month of two ago, i filed a report of a sighting of a similar object that appeared to me in the same fashion except for the fact that it was much smaller, or further away from me. both were circular, both were the same very bright pale blue, and both appeared and moved tremendously fast before disappearing from my sight. i've included a sketch of what i saw with this report but please bear with me as i am about as far from an artist as a person, with full use of his hands, can be. i tried to illustrate the obstruction of the trees and the fact that the glow and shape of the craft was still apparent to me.
content.summary: Very bright pale blue circle moving very fast overhead. extremely similar to one i saw just a few weeks ago.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i was with my ex girlfriend hanging out on her roof. we had a few beers but were sober for the most part. then i realized that there where three glowing lights across from us about a mile away, aprox. it was ascending in a 45 degree angle. it was a weird angle because if you ask me a baloon would go straigt up. the red was glowiing off it as if there were red lights on the inside of the object. the one at the top would vanish first then the second and then the third. i also knew it was not a baloon at this point because how could they all vanish in the same spot basicly. 1)i was in astoria, queens. it was about 10pm to 12midnight.
              2)the red light it was aluminating, 3 objects were seen flying on a weird 45 degree angle
              3)some sort of baloon, then again i didn't reall know because of the light it was illuminating
              4)the 3 red round objects were ascending, they had a red light illuminating, they ascended in a 45 degree angle, the red objects were maybe 10feet from each other
              5)it was very intresting to me because of the red light it was illuminating, after i saw them dissapearing in order from the top to the bottom object i was quite freaked out, felt better after i got off the roof and kept my mind off it 
              6)the ascending and the red object in the top dissapeared from the top one to the bottom one in the same area aprox



the second time i saw something similar was on the 4th of july and i was in a different area from the first incident. i was with a friend and instead of 3 red objects i only saw 2 but they were the same! they were red objects that also ascended and dissapeared.***** in fact i urge you to search on youtube ufo in hamilton beach that is 5 mins from my house. i'm in howard beach, ny. i'm 26 and i know i'm not crazy.
content.summary: Three red lights seemed like baloons ascended in a 45 degree angle the dissapeared in order from the top to the last

content.detailedDescription: I work as a security officer at a large manufacturing business just west of appleton wisconsin. i was on duty at this time. i had just arrived at this location, on mccarthy road, approx 1/2 mile north of highway 15, as part of my "rounds". i was speaking with another guard about 15 feet east of a small "guardhouse"where he was stationed. he was facing to the north, toward the plant (about 100 feet away), i was facing south. suddenly, i noticed above him, above the large empty field to the south, a very bright, luminous light, which appeared to me to be stationary, approx. 30 degrees above the southern horizon, it appeared to be relatively close to us. i must emphasize that it's brightness was extraordinary, a pure white light, spherical,much brighter then any celestial object, there was no moon and the sky was clear.It appeared to be quite large,much more then just a spot of light. at arm's length i would say it was about the size of half my fist.   there was no sound i could hear, and no flashing lights of any kind such as an aircraft would have(local airport is about 3 miles west of here). i observed it, without any mention to the other guard, for just 10 seconds or so, when suddenly it appeared to move south very fast,at that very moment it disappeared, going from extremely bright to absolutely nothing.    my first reaction was "what the hell is that?" though i said nothing then or after to the other guard. i have an avid interest in astronomy, and can say beyond doubt this was not any meteorite, planet, etc. it was much too bright,and much larger,and did not appear to be moving until it suddenly accelerated south very rapidly,and then nothing. not like any aircraft, i see planes all the time when i'm working, this was not a plane. i am a senior guard at this business, well respected and trustworthy, like i say i am always looking to the sky, and this was unlike anything i've ever seen before. please contact me if you please, though there's not much else i can really add. thankyou!
content.summary: I witnessed a very bright,  large object nearby,in the evening sky

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 4 2011 i saw flying lights at around 845 pm in kingman arizona. i was driving down the road and i was facing east. i saw 4 strange lights in a weird pattern i decided that something was not right so i knew the road i was on went out into the desert so i went about 5 miles out of town and now there was 8 lights in the sky in different patterns from horizontal lines to rectangles to circles. as soon as i got to the desert there was another car already out there and one soon showed up and then a few minutes later there was 4-5 cars including mine. having a truck and it being the desert i went out as far as i could and i go to i would say about 2 miles away. i was standing lights of and i knew they were not airplanes because they were just sitting there but being so close i also didn���������t hear any helicopter noises  i took a bunch of pictures and the last one was when they were in a rectangle and then they started to circle the city it seemed and then they all started going towards the ground and where most of them flew i knew there was departments so i decided to head out that way and i think i saw one on the ground but as soon as i parked my car a cop seemed to appear out of nowhere and he asked me if i had a problem i responded if i was trespassing and he said i wasn���������t and so i started to tell him about the lights and showed him the pictures. he then proceeded to tell me that there are new aircraft that hover and don���������t make noise but i haven���������t heard of anything like that. i said i should go and he goes good idea and as i was turning my car around he turned left to go where the lights had seemed to land. the whole cop thing seemed rather suspicious and it just didn���������t feel right i was out in the middle of nowhere and i didn���������t even see him coming but take that for what it is worth. i then went home and looked up the number to call and report i tried calling a couple of times and it was busy and then i started to see the lights again this time they were heading south and they were in a horizontal formation i went had gotten gas and that���������s when i tried take more pictures and only one came out and it seems really weird. when i was looking at the lights i was able to get through and the person told me to try and get as many people to look and report. i got in my car and started to head south but they just seemed to disappear rather quickly i saw them and then i didn���������t see them i tried waiting around but then i had to be somewhere at midnight that is why i am writing the report so late. i will include pics in the email and try and describe them. the lights every time i saw them where just white and they did blink but only sometimes and i didn���������t see any other color. also no noise at all and moved methodically

7. zoom it speaks for it self i gives me the chils looking at it.

my name is micheal baca my phone is 928 377 2883

content.summary: Ufo sighting kingman az

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting outside looking at the stars at approximately 9:00 pm. we live in a rural area so it is very dark, great for stargazing.  we were complaining about the noise of a neighbor, when we heard a helicopter approaching and i laughed and said that i was also tired of the sounds of the many military helicopters that fly over at all hours of the night. 

so we were waiting for the helicopter to pass over, when we saw 2 blue balls of light flying in tandem with the helicopter flying slightly below the blue balls of light.  it appeared like the helicopter was trying to follow the blue balls of light, but the lights were much faster than the helicopter. within a matter of a few seconds, the balls of light had zipped across the sky and out of our view.  you couldn't see an actual aircraft, the entire aircraft appeared as a blue light. the blue balls of light were close to the same size as the helicopter, but definitely not the same shape.  they were oval/disc shaped.  the only sound was that of the helicopter.  i'd say that the lights were within 1000 ft distance from where we were sitting.  

my husband and i were both dumbfounded, even though both of us had witnessed a ufo in december of 2010.  we talked about what we saw, and both of us had the same description of the event.  we both agreed that it was like something out of a movie, in fact it best reminded me of the scene in close encounters where the lights are flying over the spectators on the highway.  

we stayed outside for a while afterwards, hoping to see it again.  we saw planes and noticed the difference between planes and what we saw.  planes are much slower, you can distinctly hear them, and they have flashing blue/red lights.
content.summary: Two blue balls of light near temecula

content.detailedDescription:
Around midnight my freind and i witnessed a ufo flying surprisingly close to the house. we were inside the second story of the house looking out the window at the stars. we were able to get a excellent view of the object as it passed the large window, 15 yards away and right above a 30ft cherry tree. a extremely low flying object resembling a grey jet with an almost flat underside, passing through the back yard. travling in a straight path, no signs of slowing or exeleration staying at a medium slow pace. this object didn't act, sound, or look like an ordinary jet but in no way was a model. 3-4 lights undearneath glowing one solid color red or green, approximatley 3-4ft in diameter. the object had a wingspan of approximately 15-20ft.

i was stunned and excited about what we had just witnessed. if i was older at the time this happend i would have pursued it. somthing odd is that it didn't produce any sound for how big it is. 

i did some research afterwards to see if this could have been a model, but didn't come up with anything that resembled it. the size could probably be mached. if anyone was controlling it they would have had one hell of a time trying to land it in the neightborhood yet alone trying to keep there eyes on the craft. the only point of visbility of the craft at the time was from the back yard, until the craft went over more trees, higher into the sky, and going over houses.
content.summary: Low flying jet. like object  wing span tip to tip 15ft

content.detailedDescription: I was at the azusa foothill drive-in theater for my 16th birthday on 8/12/69.  i remember almost every detail because it made such an impression on me; i even remember the movies we were seeing:  how the west was won and the war wagon (double feature).  it was during intermission after my mother and i came back with snacks from the snack bar. (time was between 9:30 and 10:10 pm estimate) we were sitting in the car and my mother saw it first and said "what is that?!...Pointing.  i looked and saw a typical saucer shaped metalic craft with rotating lights.  i was very clear and very solid, no mistaking what it was. i think that the rotating lights were blue, this i cannot recolect as well.  it was not a blimp. i was familiar with a blimp shape.  we saw it above the drive-in screen but further south (away from our position).  it was traveling slow speed...Slow as a standard airplane from the east towards west (our left to right).  when the ufo reached our 2 oclock position, it sudden banked and i saw its underside... it took off instantaneously upward (but slightly toward the 11 oclock position).  the speed of excelleration was so incredibly fast.  no known airplane or jet could accellerate that fast. it was a blink of an eye.  we looked out of the car to see if anyone might have seen the same thing.  there was no indication that anyone within our sight was pointing toward the sky.  but we could not see anyone behind us and there was perhaps 40 to 50 cars there.  my mother would not talk about it afterwards, she seemed visably shaken.  i will never forget, it changed my life.  i can provide a drawing if requested.
content.summary: Estmate 1000 feet up, standard saucer shape, rotating lights on saucer edge, slow east to west traveling then abrupt banking and rapid accelleration up at 11 oclock position.  speed more rapid than anything in existance.

content.detailedDescription: At 7:16 am, i saw a commercial airliner heading a normal trajectory towards our local international airport, i spotted above and beyound it a silver light, round shaped object on a straight trajectory, which suddenly vanished. sun was up, no clouds in the sky. i observed this for about twenty seconds and knew there was something odd about the silver light before it vanished.
content.summary: Silver light!

content.detailedDescription: i was haveing a smoke in the street.Small street...Watching the stars,,when i spotted 2 small star like lites on the eastern horizion.It semed they were comeing at me.At that time i also heard voices coming up behind me,,a young neighbor an her friend.We all watched as the 2 lets say head lites approched ..I thought they may of been a pair of helicopters,,but real fast the lights were getting too big for helicopters.But that was their disstance apart from each other.My next thought was they were search lites ,,but no too big 100ft circles??,,,,then it stopped comeing at us.We could see two big beams of white lite going westward.Toward the gulf.Where it stopped seemed to be one street away and 200 or 300ft up...Then it lite up 2 rows of 7 or 8 lites all differant colors not moveing.We couldnt see any frame just lites....All the lites in the two rows started moveing real fast...Then it disappeared.The girls were like what was it mike ??? then one of them said that small airplane had to see it..And also pointed out we could hear the sm plain. but not the ufo....I did go to our small county airport..To ask ...They gave no answers...I think about this everyday....
content.summary: 3 in total witnessed two very small lites come at us.Got very big,saw beam of lite from both lites going thru sky.....Then 2 rows of multi colored lites,,,,they rotated & dissappeared...

content.detailedDescription:
A big group of us arived at lake mead
marina with boat and camping gear
for the memorial day weekend @ 
8:30 p.M. we decided to make two runs
in the boat reggie john & i (rich) would take all the
camping gear in the boat and find our
camp site about 2 miles across the lake.
the 2nd run would pick all the others
and back to the camp site. during the
crossing the boat hit something in the
water and it sheared the prop pin, as this
has happened before i had a spare pin.
so i went over the side into the water
to installed the new pin. i looked up to
have reggie hand me the new pin i saw this 
enormous big black triangle with lights at each corner
that seem to be hovering over us and completly silent
i asked the others if they were seeing
what  i was seeing and could not believe
their eyes. then we saw the two other
craft that were farther away and alot higher.
we watched these craft for at least 5min.
until they ascended upward without making
any noise.
content.summary: Large black triangles / made no sound hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was on my computer at about 3:13 a.M when my comuter in my room was making blury things on my screen (like when a tv loses signal) and i turned it off and from the reflection of the computer, saw a ufo outside, at first i though it was a comet or meteor but then it made this boomerang movement then it dissapeard, i kept checking to see if it would come back but it never did
content.summary: The ufo was going about 100 miles an hour in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and myself were sitting watching tv and we both heard some very loud booms that seemed to be hitting the front of our house. this was a series of several extremely loud booms similar to sonic booms, but slightly dfferent. they seemed louder and closer to the ground but at a distance possibly to the southwest of our home. we called the police and the dispatcher told us that they had gotten several calls about it and that they thought it was the wind. we know it was not the wind! we do not feel that the police treated this appropriately for whatever reason. they blew us off as they must have done to all of the other callers. how could they have had that answer so quickly?
 we are not totally sure of the date of this event but we had seen a tv show about the kokomo event and we both thought that it could have been that same night. we do know it was around 10:30 pm. my husband went outside to check out everything with our house and did not see anything in the sky at all. this was one of the loudest noises we have ever heard.
content.summary: We believe we may have heard the kokomo boom or booms or something like it.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside like i have for the last few months. it was about 12:23 am. and i turned on my night vision and looked up over the trees in the back yard. just over lake sherwood. and a disk shaped object was hovering up and down and left to right. i could see it as it tilted and it would reflect a round shape. then it would be vertical as too see it directly the side side veiw which then it appeared very clear with the night vision. i thought i could stand to see it but it would become invisible. so i sat back down. then i could watch it as it hovered, shifting around but only moving witht the scope just a few inches from side to side and up and down. it was mostly visible as it seemed to try and vanish. but it couldnt. i couldnt beleive what i was seeing only throught the night vision so i had my girlfriend look from where i was sitting. she said she could see it as she watched it for about a min. she was very frieghtned and wanted to go inside. you could not see this with your own eyes at all. as i stayed and watched it for a bit longer. i thought it could be a reflection from some where. but after staying and watching it , it finnally moved to the west ins a sudden movement about 6 or 7 inches to the right.Then stopped. it hovered then slowly moved behind the east tree. it came back out horizontally and hovered went back behind tree came back out same way . went back in and came back out vertical and side veiw so it was clear to me and took off and dissapeared in one second. i would not have been able to wittness this event if it wasnt for night vision. a week ago we both had an event of a 70's vw wagon sive floresant looking light about 1,000 feet in the air pass over our home very steady and slow. about 20 mph with no noise to it. maybe a slight electrical like humming, very faint sound. i feel like they know i am looking at them. i am a bit scared now, but i have seen many things over the years. as if i know when they are around. but these 2 events have really shakin me up ! god bless ! i am not making it up as god as my wittness, so help me god we both wittnessed this.
content.summary: Hovered just south of my home, could only see it with night vision !

content.detailedDescription:
I was swimming in my own pool around 0715pm on august 7th in the evening.
the sun hasn't set yet and the sky was still very bright. there was no cloud at all and nothing in the sky except the moon they just came out.
i was a very bright, glowing golden triangle in the sky. it was very clear, and i have 2.0  eyesight. i saw it flying and at first i thought it was a plane, but it didn't flash like a plane would. it suddenly moved towards right, then suddenly moved left. it just moved, not turned, unlike an airplane would turn with its head in the direction of where it's going, the triagnle didn't turn, just shifted from left to right and then out of my sight (because my rooftop blocked my vision).
it was a sunday, and i'm pretty sure malaysians do not have fighter jets or would fly anything on a sunday especially during fasting month.
i live in an area where there is no building taller than my house in about more than 15km radius, and there are only trees and jungle around my house.
no airplane fly acorss my house, not that i have known of.
content.summary: A very bright golden triangular flying object
content.locationName: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my boyfriend went for a walk on the nearest mountain, and we were watching the sunset and the moon when we saw the object just apeared on the sky. first we tought it was a chinese lantern, but its not possible to be a chinese lantern, because it went so hight in the sky. that was when we realized it was a ufo right in front of us. it went in a straight path on the sky, going up, and it didnt made sound or noise. my boyfriend started recording the object on his camera while i was watching it with my own eyes. we lost sight of the object because it desapeard. in one second it was going up and glowing and in the other it just desapeard.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=hiczkod3wa0&feature=channel_video_title
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=tmyrvekkucw&feature=channel_video_title
content.summary: I was walking with my girlfriend and i saw a bright object at the sky and i filmed it. i made 2 videos of it until it disappeared. you can see it disappearing at the second video. the object was getting higher and higher and it isn't a star. http://www.Yo

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my laptop and my grandma screamed my name and i saw a ufo i was very surprised
 my grandma called my name  then i looked up in the sky
  well my  grandma know about the ufo stuff 
the ufo was a ovle shape its had lights around it
i was scard and amazed all at the same time its was a wonderfull experence
it went farther away and i could see go higher in the air till it fatted away
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mywe seen various  strange silent lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th as fireworks went off around my block i witnessed 3 fire-like lights cross the sky from my backyard.

they looked like flames that might come from hot-air balloons, but there appeared to be nothing above the visible flames. the flames were constant, and i thought perhaps i could hear a hot air balloon-like roar at times. 

i imagine they could have been larger and higher than i at first believed. if they were some kind of balloon hybrid, like perhaps a flame engine that was thrusting a steerable craft, they were surely flying in an illegal manner, no lights, just flame. i felt i should have been able to see whatever the frame or body of these crafts was, but there was nothing to see but flame.

they crossed my wide visible horizon in about 3 minutes.

i shot video of this event on my camera phone.

on 7/29/11, 25 days later at 9:34 pm also in chicago, i was exiting a menards store at 2601 n. clybourn ave. 60614 and i witnessed the same fire in the sky.

this time there were 3-4 witnesses and 6 flames in the sky. they seemed to be maneuvering more this time speeds seemed to change and they disappeared before they left the horizon ... perhaps behind clouds but it didn't seem there were any clouds.

one witness was a menards worker collecting carts who saw our interest and stated "there was like 10 of them before" referring to earlier in the night.

i am in contact with one of the other witnesses who may have details which differ from mine. all witnesses in the parking lot agreed that this was very strange, and that it looked like flames with nothing attached or any visible structure.
content.summary: Flaming lights fly in paths with directional changes above chicago two nights in july 2011.

content.detailedDescription: This is to report a series of sightings in the mooshehead lake region, dating back several years, most recently a recurring phenomenon. on several occasions since june of this year, my wife and i have observed through our bedroom window, bright, usually star-like objects that alternately hover then move rapidly in what appear to be random directions, but generally within a confined region of the sky.  no sound is heard.  no colored lights.  apparent magnitude varies quite a bit and sometimes the object will wink out then appear again in the same or a different location.  the most recent siting (8/6/11, approx 0415) was different in that the object appeared square and was larger, subtending an angle equal to a dime at arms length.  during this last time and on at least one other occasion, the sky was cloudy and it was raining during the period of observation.  on one occasion, i was able to photograph the object moving about with a 200 mm zoom lens, resting the camera on the window frame.  no detailed information can be extracted from the images due to movement artifact but expansive movement over a period of about 30 minutes is documented.  the area of sky in which these observations have been made is northwest of our location and we are on the east side of moosehead lake.  as an amateur astronomer, i have a pretty good sense of stars one might expect to see in the polar region at any given time and this does not fit with any of the patterns, nor is the movement consistent with position changes related to the earth's rotation; nor does it fit the pattern of satellite trajectories.  two other sitings i should mention were when i was out with my telescope doing astrophotography.  the first, several years ago, involved a very bright object, moving at a tremendous speed, from west to east across the lake, essentially going from horizon to horizon in seconds.  no sound heard.  no colored lights.  the second was in late summer of 2009.  i was up on a ridge behind our camp with the telescope.  while doing a bright star alignment, i noted a bright, disc-shaped object suddernly becoming visible over the western drop-off.  because of the elevation, i thought at first that i was seeing a plane with its landing lights on.  however, this object stayed in the same position for several minutes then just winked out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object seen multiple times in same general area.  rapid position changes between hovering.  usually star-like but most recently appeared dime-sized and square.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend was at a bus stop and we seen flash's and at first we fort it was just lighting and when my friend went home i started to walk back home and i seen a kinda purple ball shape it was really bright and i fort it was just a star and then after it hovering for about 20seconds it just faded away.
 when i got home i was panicing thinking what it was and then i started to see flashes thought my window and i took a video and about after 15min the purple light came back and i took a picture of it , the ball was all in 1 and then split into 2 balls and 1 faded away and the other ball shot up into the sky
content.summary: Purple ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a uh-60 pilot for the new jersey army national guard and  on the night of august 2nd, 2011 at approximately 2200hrs i saw something streak across the night sky that i cannot explain.  there were two pilots flying in the front, one crew chief in the right door gunner position and i was sitting at the left door gunner position.  the aircraft was facing east.  our crew chief saw a bright flash of light that dimmed his night vision goggles on the horizon toward the south.  at the same time i saw a lighted object pass over from the right to the left side of the aircraft at about 20 to 30 thousand feet level.  the object was rectangle in shape with squared off corners.  it was fully lit.  it streaked across the sky in about 2-3 seconds.  much slower then shooting star but much faster then a jetliner.  it faded off just short of the horizon toward the north due to low cloud coverage that was at 5 thousand feet.  since i was under night vision goggles i saw no vapor trail which is very common with shooting stars.  
this looked nothing like any shooting start i had ever seen.  a shooting star is usually just a single pin point of light, streaks across the sky in a blink of an eye and always leaves a vapor trail behind it.  this object looked like a paper half gallon milk carton that was completely lit.
content.summary: Paper half gallon milk carton that was completely lit

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside to check the weather, it was 3:00 a.M. the sky was clear and warm for february. i walked out to the curb and noticed a large well lit object coming across the sky.  i decided to watch it to see what it was. i have a large pine tree in my front yard with a wide umbrella of branches.  i thought it wise to stay in the shadows of the branches as the object approached. it flew directly over my house. it was not moving fast, like an airplane would.  as it crossed above me i stepped out from under the branches to get a better look at it, the sky was very dark, i could barely make out the shape against the stars.  i heard a humming sound as if it had fans running. the object had eight very bright lights, which made it obvious that it was not an airplane, it was not flying in the direction an airplane would.  reno is to the north of where i live, that is the only airport in my area that would accommodate an aircraft of that size. it appeared to be about 100' above the trees. it was flying from east to west towards lake tahoe across the carson valley. there were no lights on the rear of the object. i was wearing black pajamas and felt reasonably certain i would not be seen. i did not feel i was in any danger, i was curious as to what the object was.  later i had seen a clip on the news of two young fellows who had video taped with their cell phone an object that looked exactly like the object that i had seen. it took several minutes for it to cross the sky.  also, i did not have on any exterior lighting.
content.summary: Viewed object flying across sky
